programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: المغرب .. بطل كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة
programme.desc: توج المغرب مسيرة تاريخية في تشيلي في أكتوبر 2025، بفوزه على الأرجنتين 2-0 لاستعادة الكأس في كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة. وكانت النتيجة أول فوز لكأس العالم للمغرب على أي مستوى من الفئات العمرية في تاريخ البلاد. شاهد أفضل لحظات هذا الإنجاز حصريًا على beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: واشنطن كوماندرز ضد ميامي دولفينز - اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي - الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم - 2025/26
programme.desc: تغطية حية وحصرية لـ NFL (الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم). يتكون اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي بشكل أساسي من موسم منتظم مدته 18 أسبوعًا، والذي يمتد في الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية من أوائل سبتمبر إلى أوائل يناير. يبلغ موسم اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي ذروته في السوبر بول، الذي لعب في أوائل فبراير

programme.title: أستون فيلا ضد الاتحاد الآسيوي لكرة القدم بورنموث - الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز 2025/2026 الأسبوع 11
programme.desc: جميع المباريات البالغ عددها 380 مباراة من الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN. جميع المطابقات متاحة مباشرة مع اختيار التعليق باللغة العربية أو الإنجليزية. سيتألف الموسم من 33 عطلة نهاية أسبوع وخمس جولات من المباريات في منتصف الأسبوع. ليفربول هو حامل اللقب، بعد أن فاز بلقبه الثاني في الدوري الممتاز.

programme.title: FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Ajax vs Galatasaray - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Salzburg vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: France vs Belgium (QF1) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Arturo COELLO ESP Agustin TAPIA ARG vs Chingotto/Galan - Final Men - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuw
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.desc: تغطية حية وحصرية لـ NFL (الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم). يتكون اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي بشكل أساسي من موسم منتظم مدته 18 أسبوعًا، والذي يمتد في الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية من أوائل سبتمبر إلى أوائل يناير. يبلغ موسم اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي ذروته في السوبر بول، الذي لعب في أوائل فبراير

programme.title: UAE vs IRAQ - AFC World Cup 2026 Qualifiers Rund 5 Playoffs
programme.desc: The fourth round of AFC 2026 FIFA World Cup Qualification matches take place over three days. The third-placed and fourth-placed teams from the third round were divided into two groups of three teams. Group A features Qatar, UAE & Oman and will play their matches in Qatar. Group B Features KSA, Iraq & Indonesia who will play their games in KSA. The winners of each group will qualify directly for the 2026 FIFA World Cup, while the runners-up will advance to the fifth round.

programme.title: IRAQ vs UAE - AFC World Cup Qualifiers Rund 5 Playoffs
programme.desc: Live and exclusive on beIN, the fifth and the final round of the AFC qualification for the FIFA World Cup 26. Iraq and United Arab Emirates will play in Abu Dhabi and Basra on 13th and 18th November. The winner of the home-and-away fixtures will secure a place in next year’s FIFA Play-Off Tournament.

programme.title: Marc Márquez: More than a Comeback
programme.desc: After 2,184 days, 108 crashes, six surgeries and 30 missed Grands Prix, Marc Marquez has once again claimed the MotoGP World Championship title, doing so for an astonishing seventh time. But it’s been more than a comeback for the Spanish rider, who has endured his own personal calvary over the past six years. Through exclusive interviews with Marc, his friends and family, and never-before-seen footage, this 30-minute documentary provides previously unheard perspectives on the highs and lows of the Spaniard’s arduous journey back to the top of Grand Prix motorcycle racing

programme.title: One Friday Fight -129
programme.desc: ONE Friday Fights 129 lights up Bangkok on Oct 17 with 12 bouts across Muay Thai, MMA, and kickboxing. Expect fireworks in the headliner as Thailand’s Tengnueng collides with Myanmar’s Tun Min Aung in a KO-hungry showdown. Plus, standout clashes: Petlampun vs Ayad Albadr, and 19-year-old Fergus Smith vs Zahran Al-Wesabi. Live from Lumpinee Boxing Stadium, its elbows, knees, and spinning kicks all night in a stacked showcase. Prelims spotlight rising prospects; main card promises fast finishes.

programme.title: Marc Márquez: More than a Comeback
programme.desc: After 2,184 days, 108 crashes, six surgeries and 30 missed Grands Prix, Marc Marquez has once again claimed the MotoGP World Championship title, doing so for an astonishing seventh time. But it’s been more than a comeback for the Spanish rider, who has endured his own personal calvary over the past six years. Through exclusive interviews with Marc, his friends and family, and never-before-seen footage, this 30-minute documentary provides previously unheard perspectives on the highs and lows of the Spaniard’s arduous journey back to the top of Grand Prix motorcycle racing

programme.title: ONE Fight Night - 35
programme.desc: History will be made when ONE Championship returns to the world-famous Lumpinee Stadium for ONE Fight Night 35: Buntan vs. Hemetsberger, which broadcasts live in U.S. primetime on Friday, September 5. In the main event, a new ONE Women’s Strawweight Muay Thai World Champion will be crowned. Filipino-American superstar Jackie Buntan already holds the ONE Women’s Strawweight Kickboxing World Title, and now, she’ll have a chance to become the third two-sport queen in ONE Championship history. But Austrian dynamo Stella Hemetsberger wants to keep her momentum rolling in Bangkok, earn the biggest win of her career, and claim the richest prize in the sport. Plus, ONE Welterweight Submission Grappl

programme.title: Istres vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: FIFA U-17 World Cup Qatar 2025 Bulletin - @22:00
programme.desc: A special bulletin covering all the news about the FIFA U-17 World Cup Qatar 2025, which will see the participation of 48 teams, including six Arab teams: Qatar, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Morocco, Tunisia and Egypt. The FIFA U-17 World Cup Qatar 2025 is the first of five consecutive editions that Qatar will be hosting.

programme.title: FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.desc: تغطية حية وحصرية لـ NFL (الدوري الوطني لكرة القدم). يتكون اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي بشكل أساسي من موسم منتظم مدته 18 أسبوعًا، والذي يمتد في الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية من أوائل سبتمبر إلى أوائل يناير. يبلغ موسم اتحاد كرة القدم الأميركي ذروته في السوبر بول، الذي لعب في أوائل فبراير

programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. programme.title: FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Ajax vs Galatasaray - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Champions League is live and exclusive only on beIN. Paris Saint-Germain are the defending champions. The 2025/26 UEFA Champions League will be the second to be played under the new 36-team league phase. The final will be played on 30 May 2026 at Puskás Aréna in Budapest, Hungary.

programme.title: Salzburg vs Go Ahead Eagles - UEFA Europa League 2025/2026 - MD4
programme.desc: The 2025–26 UEFA Europa League is the secondary club football tournament organised by UEFA. This is the second season played under a new format, which replaced the 32-team group stage with a 36-team league phase. Tottenham Hotspur are the reigning champions. The final will be played on 20 May 2026 at Beşiktaş Stadium in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: France vs Belgium (QF1) - Davis Cup (Final 8) 2025 - Bologna Fiere
Felix AUGER-ALIASSIME (CAN) vs Jannik SINNER (ITA) - Final - Rolex Paris Masters - Paris - 2025
programme.desc: The 2025 Rolex Paris Masters will be held from 27 October to 2 November at the new Paris La Défense Arena. Now in its 54th edition, this ATP Masters 1000 tournament features the world’s top players battling on indoor hard courts in both singles and doubles draws. With total prize money of €6,128,940, the event serves as the final major stop before the ATP Finals, promising a thrilling conclusion to the tennis season.

programme.title: Arturo COELLO ESP Agustin TAPIA ARG vs Chingotto/Galan - Final Men - FIP World Cup Pairs Padel - Kuw
programme.desc: The inaugural FIP World Cup – Pairs in Kuwait (Nov 3-9 2025) crowns the first-ever “FIP World Champion” pair in men’s and women’s categories. Winners receive 2,000 FIP ranking points and a combined prize pool of over €1 million, equally shared between the men’s and women’s draws. Kuwait builds on its success hosting the Premier Padel P1 earlier in the season.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: UAE vs IRAQ - AFC World Cup 2026 Qualifiers Rund 5 Playoffs
programme.desc: The fourth round of AFC 2026 FIFA World Cup Qualification matches take place over three days. The third-placed and fourth-placed teams from the third round were divided into two groups of three teams. Group A features Qatar, UAE & Oman and will play their matches in Qatar. Group B Features KSA, Iraq & Indonesia who will play their games in KSA. The winners of each group will qualify directly for the 2026 FIFA World Cup, while the runners-up will advance to the fifth round.

programme.title: IRAQ vs UAE - AFC World Cup Qualifiers Rund 5 Playoffs
programme.desc: Live and exclusive on beIN, the fifth and the final round of the AFC qualification for the FIFA World Cup 26. Iraq and United Arab Emirates will play in Abu Dhabi and Basra on 13th and 18th November. The winner of the home-and-away fixtures will secure a place in next year’s FIFA Play-Off Tournament.

programme.title: المغرب .. بطل كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة
programme.desc: توج المغرب مسيرة تاريخية في تشيلي في أكتوبر 2025، بفوزه على الأرجنتين 2-0 لاستعادة الكأس في كأس العالم تحت 20 سنة. وكانت النتيجة أول فوز لكأس العالم للمغرب على أي مستوى من الفئات العمرية في تاريخ البلاد. شاهد أفضل لحظات هذا الإنجاز حصريًا على beIN SPORTS.

programme.title: Marc Márquez: More than a Comeback
programme.desc: After 2,184 days, 108 crashes, six surgeries and 30 missed Grands Prix, Marc Marquez has once again claimed the MotoGP World Championship title, doing so for an astonishing seventh time. But it’s been more than a comeback for the Spanish rider, who has endured his own personal calvary over the past six years. Through exclusive interviews with Marc, his friends and family, and never-before-seen footage, this 30-minute documentary provides previously unheard perspectives on the highs and lows of the Spaniard’s arduous journey back to the top of Grand Prix motorcycle racing

programme.title: One Friday Fight -129
programme.desc: ONE Friday Fights 129 lights up Bangkok on Oct 17 with 12 bouts across Muay Thai, MMA, and kickboxing. Expect fireworks in the headliner as Thailand’s Tengnueng collides with Myanmar’s Tun Min Aung in a KO-hungry showdown. Plus, standout clashes: Petlampun vs Ayad Albadr, and 19-year-old Fergus Smith vs Zahran Al-Wesabi. Live from Lumpinee Boxing Stadium, its elbows, knees, and spinning kicks all night in a stacked showcase. Prelims spotlight rising prospects; main card promises fast finishes.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night - 35
programme.desc: History will be made when ONE Championship returns to the world-famous Lumpinee Stadium for ONE Fight Night 35: Buntan vs. Hemetsberger, which broadcasts live in U.S. primetime on Friday, September 5. In the main event, a new ONE Women’s Strawweight Muay Thai World Champion will be crowned. Filipino-American superstar Jackie Buntan already holds the ONE Women’s Strawweight Kickboxing World Title, and now, she’ll have a chance to become the third two-sport queen in ONE Championship history. But Austrian dynamo Stella Hemetsberger wants to keep her momentum rolling in Bangkok, earn the biggest win of her career, and claim the richest prize in the sport. Plus, ONE Welterweight Submission Grappl

programme.title: USA vs Morocco - FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 32
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Al Arabi vs Al Ahli - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W7
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Istres vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs. Manchester United - English Premier League 2025/2026
programme.desc: جميع المباريات البالغ عددها 380 مباراة من الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN. جميع المطابقات متاحة مباشرة مع اختيار التعليق باللغة العربية أو الإنجليزية. سيتألف الموسم من 33 عطلة نهاية أسبوع وخمس جولات من المباريات في منتصف الأسبوع. ليفربول هو حامل اللقب، بعد أن فاز بلقبه الثاني في الدوري الممتاز.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: PALESTINE, ONE JERSEY, MANY ROOTS
programme.desc: Story of the Palestinian national football team, a team that is far more than the sum of its players. Separated by borders, by checkpoints, and exile, the tells is inspiring “One Jersey…Many Roots” them is a single jersey, a shared dream, and a deep sense of responsibility to players come from every corner of Palestine and from communities scattered across the globe. What unites represent their people on and off the pitch that Palestine endures. This is not just in every match, they carry not just a ball but the weight of history, identity and hope. Fot their supporters, each goal is a voice, each victory a declaration. Football it s a living emblem of unity, resilience and the unbreakable b

programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: مجلة UCL للاتحاد الأوروبي لكرة القدم 2025/2026 - معاينة MD5
programme.desc: ملخص لأفضل ما في اللعبة، بالإضافة إلى التطلع إلى يوم المباراة التالي في مسابقة كرة القدم الأوروبية الممتازة، دوري أبطال أوروبا UEFA. ستكون دوري أبطال أوروبا 2025/26 هي الثانية التي ستلعب في إطار مرحلة الدوري الجديد المكون من 36 فريقًا. جميع المباريات من دوري أبطال أوروبا مباشرة وحصرية فقط على beIN مع اختيار التعليق العربي أو الإنجليزي.

programme.title: FIFA Under 17 World Cup Qatar 2025 - Round of 16
programme.desc: 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup The 2025 FIFA U-17 World Cup will be held in Qatar from the 3rd through until the 27th November. It will be the first of the five consecutive U-17 World Cups held in Qatar. This edition will be the first to be played in the 48-team format instead of the previous biennial 24-team tournaments.
